targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "st2.auth.response" WHERE ("status" =~ /2[\d]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "st2.auth.response" WHERE ("status" =~ /[4-9][\d]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Num Requests - Disabled because they are double counted
targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "st2_api_request" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "st2_api_response_status" WHERE ("status_code" =~ /2[\d]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "st2_api_response_status" WHERE ("status_code" =~ /[4-9][\d]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "st2.action.executions" WHERE ("status" = '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "st2_action_executions_running" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "st2.action.executions" WHERE ("status" =~ /[a-z]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "status" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("executions"), 10s)FROM "st2.action" WHERE ("action" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pack", "action" fill(null)

panels.description: Amount of time an action took to run, max()'d

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("mean"), 10s) FROM "st2.action.executions" WHERE ("action_ref" = 'core.local' AND "metric_type" = 'timing') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "action_ref" fill(null)

panels.title: Slowest Execution Times by Action (seconds)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("matched"), 10s) FROM "st2.rule" WHERE ("metric_type" = 'counter' AND "pack" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pack", "rule" fill(none)

targets.alias: Processed $tag_pack.$tag_rule - Dont enable this, the metrics are broken and never sent into the database
targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("processed"), 10s) FROM "st2.rule" WHERE ("metric_type" = 'counter' AND "pack" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pack", "rule" fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("value"), 10s) FROM "st2.rule" WHERE ("metric_type" = 'counter' AND "pack" != '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pack", "rule" fill(none)
